about_the_game:
This DLC adds adult content to the game
Regarding adult content, you need to click on the album to enter, all women in it are adults, and do not contain extreme sexual acts such as violent sexual assault

Game introduction

The basement of the Hundred Percent Hotel is a gathering place for high society, where celebrities enjoy parties, drinking and having fun.
Tonight, the so-called brightest newcomer - Joy is here, and she can't wait to find someone to dance with.
Ladies and gentlemen, do you want to have a happy dance with tonight's charming female guest—joy? sure! Just solve her puzzles to unlock a variety of hot and sexy dance poses!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not suitable for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general adult content
All sexually explicit characters are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.
